title: [Griffin's Keen, Granite Cave]
description: Sunlight sifts thinly through the blue sheet of ice that forms one wall of this large cave.  Glittering granite rock forms two long, low walls that come to a point deep in the darkness.  This haven, though smelling strongly of bear, offers a quiet spot to collect your thoughts.  An ancient pile of blackened bones and shreds of cloth is a reminder to move along before you freeze to the floor.

Moonlight sifts thinly through the blue sheet of ice that forms one wall of this large cave.  Glittering granite rock forms two long, low walls that come to a point deep in the darkness.  This haven, though smelling strongly of bear, offers a quiet spot to collect your thoughts.  An ancient pile of blackened bones and shreds of cloth is a reminder to move along before you freeze to the floor.
